entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It looks like NullableWalker is not going to properly handle an initializer for BoundNoPiaObjectCreationExpression #56863
  • Automate building runtime with debug compiler #56854
    17.1
  • Go To Definition for typeof(Program) highlights the first keyword/identifier in Program.cs #56848
    Backlog
  • Async lightbulb performance improvements #56843
    17.1

Closed

  • String interpolation + LangVersion=10.0 + out parameters results in CS1615 #56579
    17.0
  • Parser should allow lambdas with `ref` return types in assignments without requiring parentheses #54258
    17.0
  • Values in CompilerVisibleProperty containing #s don't transfer to source generators #56656
  • Add the ability to escape strings with special characters (e.g. quotes) when pasting into Visual Studio. #56661
  • Semantic classification is currently unavailable #56766
    17.0
  • Allow finalize compilation to incrementally update a prior version #46418
    Backlog
  • Re-enable TrackedGeneratorDriver.WithPendingEdits #46419
    Backlog
  • Tons of assertion failures when building runtime with debug compiler #56043
    17.0
  • Implementing auto-properties should not generate code that throws NotImplementedException #56847
  • SmartBreakLineWithTabTabCompletion2 is flaky #56394
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Added navigation to find references integration tests #56866
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393966 #56865
  • Treat receviers as by-value for interpolated string handler constructors #56864
    Area-Compilers
  • [DNM] Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56861
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Build CodeAction description into table and only generate Dev17 hash #56860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove user facing option around async-lightbulbs (17.1 and up only) #56858
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add anonymous method example to breaking changes document #56857
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393331 #56855
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393171 #56850
    auto-merge
  • Switch to ImmutableArray from raw arrays to prevent accidental mutation #56849
    Area-IDE
  • Remove containing type from lightbulb for AddParameter and GenerateMember #56846
    Area-IDE
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56840
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56851
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable async lightbulbs in 17.0 #56816
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1392248 #56839
    auto-merge
  • Stop including codebase for LSP protocol packages #56834
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Account for a ref returning lambda as a local variable initializer. #56814
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Port perf fix to release/dev17.0 #56805
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56835
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56830
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56831
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require the platform cache service in our package to ensure it's included when we are installed #56820
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0.P5
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56832
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • See through ref pointer indirection when optimizing stack locals #56790
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, UX Review Requested
  • Emit compiler version to Windows PDB #56759
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Delete remaining bits of IWaitIndicator #56355
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid UI dependency in CloudCache by passing along the solution folder #56829
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Add test verifying VB error ranges #56772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Analysis of attributes in conversions of lambdas #56792
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.1
